document.full_text: lucas glover and jonathan byrd headed into a sudden-death playoff at the quail hollow championship on sunday after finishing the regulation 72 holes tied on 15 under par.
document.title: gover and byrd head for playoff at quail hollow
lines_and_colors: lucas glover and jonathan byrd headed into a sudden-death playoff at the quail hollow championship on sunday after finishing the regulation 72 holes tied on 15 under par.
